nodes.text: The Salek-Come-Home HoloNet registry was created by the renowned kloo horn soloist Jimke Weet after the mysterious disappearance of his son Salak. Weet hoped the readers of the HoloNet News channel would contact him to provide information or donate credits so he could continue investigations.
In in Missing Starship Search Abandoned, a 2002 article published in Volume 531, Issue 49 of the HoloNet News website, Salak Weet's name was consistently misspelt as "Salek".
